title: How Love Came to Professor Kirida
description:
This is one of the oneshot that is in the Junji Ito Best of Best: Story Story Collection.

↓ NOTES ↓
Huge thanks to LuCaz for uploading this to Nyaa.si!
Nyaa.si link: https://nyaa.si/view/1272311

Also, I couldn't find the exact date for when this oneshot was released, all I know is that it was released in the year of 2007 and in the month of May. If you know the exact date please contact me on Discord: Rioki#3797
